channel.title: Prison Break Series. Just Out Right Amazing
channel.description:
I've been watching Prison Break from the start. I only seem to be the only person in my school sho likes watching things Like 24 and Prison Break. All I can say is that it is amazing. Absolutly amazing. It is the only thing I like watching now, apart from football, of course :P
[u][b]A brief description of Prison Break [/b][/u]
Prison Break is a series in which Micheal Scofield (Wentworth Miller) gets himself arrested and sent to Fox River prison to escape from the Prison with his brother, Lincoln Burrows (Dominic Purcell), because he was wrongly sentenced to death in a massive cover up, created by the President. Despite the evidence against Lincoln, Michael is convinced of his innocence. With no other options and the clock ticking toward Lincoln's execution, Michael holds up a bank to get himself incarcerated alongside his brother. Once he's inside, we learn that Michael â€“ a structural engineer with the blueprints for the prison â€“ has hatched an elaborate plan to break Lincoln out and prove that he was framed for the crime.
[u][b]Characters Pictures[/b][/u]
Benjamin "C-Note" Franklin - [URL=http://imageshack.us][IMG]http://img152.imageshack.us/img152/4828/biofranklin2cl.jpg[/img][/URL]
Captain Brad Bellick - [URL=http://imageshack.us][IMG]http://img216.imageshack.us/img216/9286/biobellick1pb.jpg[/img][/URL]

Charles Westmoreland - [URL=http://imageshack.us][IMG]http://img346.imageshack.us/img346/2129/biowestmoreland6ha.jpg[/img][/URL]
David "Tweener" Apolskis - [URL=http://imageshack.us][IMG]http://img346.imageshack.us/img346/3599/bioapolskis8rt.jpg[/img][/URL]
Fernando Sucre - [URL=http://imageshack.us][IMG]http://img346.imageshack.us/img346/9117/biosucre2jx.jpg[/img][/URL]
Warden Henry Pope - [URL=http://imageshack.us][IMG]http://img346.imageshack.us/img346/7835/biopope3uv.jpg[/img][/URL]
John Abruzzi - [URL=http://imageshack.us][IMG]http://img346.imageshack.us/img346/4194/bioabruzzi7gf.jpg[/img][/URL]
Agent Paul Kellerman & Agent Danny Hale (The Bad Guys) - [URL=http://imageshack.us][IMG]http://img346.imageshack.us/img346/2039/bioagents9el.jpg[/img][/URL]
LJ Burrows - [URL=http://imageshack.us][IMG]http://img346.imageshack.us/img346/9589/bioljburrows0oh.jpg[/img][/URL]
Lincoln Burrows - [URL=http://imageshack.us][IMG]http://img346.imageshack.us/img346/5880/bioburrows2tn.jpg[/img][/URL]
Micheal Scofield - [URL=http://imageshack.us][IMG]http://img346.imageshack.us/img346/7767/bioscofield6dp.jpg[/img][/URL]
Nick Savrinn - [URL=http://imageshack.us][IMG]http://img346.imageshack.us/img346/9421/biosavrinn7ku.jpg[/img][/URL]
Dr. Sara Tancredi - [URL=http://imageshack.us][IMG]http://img346.imageshack.us/img346/4648/biotancredi7ao.jpg[/img][/URL]
Theodore "T-Bag" Bagwell - [URL=http://imageshack.us][IMG]http://img346.imageshack.us/img346/6227/biobagwell5fl.jpg[/img][/URL]
Veronica Donovan - [URL=http://imageshack.us][IMG]http://img346.imageshack.us/img346/5336/biodonovan6wr.jpg[/img][/URL]
[b]Any character I have missed out is because they do not hold a big significance in the series[/b]
I really reccomend you download and start watching these episodes, or, if you live the in UK, Monday and Tuesday nights > Channel 5 > *9 pm - 11 pm* (Double Bills Starting From The 29th Of May)
